ai.summary: A short, easy 1.5 km woodland walk at Nugent's Wood near Strangford Lough in the UK. The trail loops through mature trees, offering a peaceful pace, birdsong and occasional glimpses of the loch.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, well-defined woodland paths with packed soil. Expect a few roots and damp patches, and some shaded sections. Suitable for beginners and families in good weather.
ai.safety_notes: Check local weather and tides for Strangford Lough vicinity. Wear sturdy footwear and bring water. Stay on marked paths, watch for slippery leaves and uneven ground. Keep dogs under control and inform someone of your plans.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn; year-round hiking is possible with proper clothing and footwear.

seo.title: Nugent's Wood Walk, Strangford Lough — Easy 1.5 km Woodland Hike
